title: The Season 2 Finale! - Game Showdown
description:
It comes down to this. On a very special episode of Game Showdown, the crew locks in and decides WHO is the season 2 champion.

Season 2, episode 16.

Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KINDAFUNNY for 50% OFF 2 or more pairs of shades.

Go to http://hims.com/kindafunny to start your free online visit today.

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:40 - First Question & Housekeeping
00:07:32 - Round Robbin’
00:29:39 - Bonus Stars
00:47:44 - Final Feudy!
